title: Urgent Order Issue Call
description: Emergency call regarding delayed birthday gift order

details.notes: Customer's daughter's birthday gift is delayed. Escalated to shipping partner for immediate resolution. Offered expedited shipping at no charge.

title: WhatsApp Order Support
description: Ongoing WhatsApp conversation about order status and return policy

details.summary: Addressed urgent shipping issue and explained return policy. Customer satisfied with response time.

title: VIP Customer Service Notes
description: Special handling notes for VIP customer with urgent request

details.content: Sarah Johnson is a VIP customer with high lifetime value. Daughter's birthday tomorrow - expedited shipping approved. Customer appreciates proactive communication and quick resolution.

title: Discount Code Support
description: Customer inquiry about pricing and discount application

details.summary: Provided SAVE20 discount code for first-time customer. Code applied successfully and customer proceeded with purchase.

title: New Customer Onboarding
description: First-time customer successfully converted with discount

details.content: Michael Chen converted from lead to customer with 20% discount. Expressed satisfaction with customer service. Good candidate for future upselling and referral program.

title: Refund Request Processing
description: Customer refund request for product not meeting technical requirements

details.summary: Processed $89.99 refund for software that didn't meet technical requirements. Customer appreciated quick resolution.

title: Product Feedback Collection
description: Valuable feedback collected about product technical limitations

details.content: Emma Rodriguez provided detailed feedback about integration features not meeting developer needs. Forwarded to product team for enhancement consideration. Maintain relationship for future product launches.

title: Delivery Inquiry
description: Customer asking about wireless headphones delivery for conference

details.summary: Customer needs headphones for weekend conference. Checking expedited shipping options.

title: Expedited Shipping Coordination
description: Call to arrange expedited shipping for time-sensitive order

details.notes: Arranged next-day delivery for conference deadline. Customer agreed to expedited shipping fee. Order will arrive Friday morning.

title: Critical API Integration Issue
description: Business-critical API integration failure affecting operations

details.resolution: Escalated to senior technical team. API integration issue identified and fix in progress.

title: Emergency Technical Support
description: Emergency call for business-critical system issue

details.notes: Critical API integration issue affecting customer's business operations. Escalated to engineering team for immediate resolution. Customer has 4 clients waiting.

title: Enterprise Solution Inquiry
description: Initial inquiry about enterprise plans and pricing

details.summary: Discussed enterprise solutions for 200-person team. Sent pricing information and case studies.

title: Enterprise Lead Qualification
description: Qualification notes for potential enterprise customer

details.content: Robert Wilson from consulting firm evaluating enterprise solutions. 200-person team, decision maker with budget authority. Sent enterprise package information and case studies. Follow up scheduled for next week.

title: Premium Plan Demo Follow-up
description: Post-demo call to discuss Premium plan purchase

details.notes: Customer very impressed with demo, especially automation features. Ready to purchase Premium plan. Needs contract and onboarding scheduled this week.

title: Purchase Decision Confirmation
description: Customer confirmed purchase decision for Premium plan

details.summary: Customer confirmed Premium plan purchase. Requesting contract and onboarding call this week.

title: Hot Lead Conversion
description: High-value lead ready to convert to Premium plan

details.content: Jennifer Adams is ready to purchase Premium plan after successful demo. Marketing Director at growing agency, perfect target customer. Prepare contract and schedule onboarding call for this week.

title: LinkedIn Lead Initial Contact
description: First contact with lead from LinkedIn marketing automation ad

details.summary: New lead interested in marketing automation for 50-person team. Requesting pricing information.

title: LinkedIn Lead Qualification
description: Initial qualification of LinkedIn marketing automation lead

details.content: Kevin Martinez from GrowthTech Solutions interested in marketing automation. 50-person team, growth manager role. Found us through LinkedIn ads. Budget-conscious but sees value in automation.

title: Training Follow-up
description: Post-training follow-up with existing customer

details.summary: Customer very satisfied with training. Team seeing improvements. Mentioned need for additional licenses next month.

title: Upselling Opportunity
description: Identified expansion opportunity with existing customer

details.content: Amanda Taylor's team seeing great results post-training. Mentioned needing additional licenses next month. Excellent upselling opportunity. Schedule follow-up call to discuss expansion options.

title: Critical System Outage
description: Emergency ticket for dashboard system outage affecting sales team

details.resolution: Engineering team immediately notified. System status page updated. Expected resolution within 1 hour.

title: Emergency System Outage Call
description: Immediate response call for critical system outage

details.notes: Critical dashboard outage affecting entire sales team. Engineering team activated, expected resolution within 1 hour. Customer updated on progress every 15 minutes.

title: System Outage Emergency Response
description: Urgent WhatsApp response to system outage affecting sales operations

details.summary: Immediate acknowledgment of critical system issue. Engineering team notified and working on resolution.
